name: Wise Core
text: Once per turn, this card cannot be destroyed by battle. If this card is destroyed by a card effect: Destroy all monsters you control, then Special Summon 1 each of "Meklord Emperor Wisel ∞", "Wisel Top", "Wisel Attack", "Wisel Guard", and "Wisel Carrier" from your hand, Deck or Graveyard.
